resources.string: Text Messenger App provides free Caller ID
Prepare yourself for incoming calls and avoid spam callers with Text Messenger\'s high quality Caller ID.
We respect your privacy and your needs, nothing is recorded and you can customize or configure the Caller ID in settings.

Location information allows us to provide you with an enhanced experience. For the best possible experince we ask that set your permission to \"Always Allow\". As part of that permission we share that precise location information with Cuebig and its partners for the purpose of tailored advertising, attribution, attribution and reasearch.
By clicking \'Get Started\' you agree to the Caller ID End User License Aggrement and Privacy Policy
